itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by Big Technology Podcast host Alex Kantrowitz to talk about the future of social media moderation and what it means for conservatives, why people don’t flock to newer and smaller (and less regulated) social med...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by Big Technology Podcast host Alex Kantrowitz to talk about the future of social media moderation and what it means for conservatives, why people don’t flock to newer and smaller (and less regulated) social media platforms, what Mark Zuckerberg is like in real life, and why Big Tech and its talent is moving to Texas.
